mapper.select: select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq from TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW t where t.sfsc = 'N' and t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.slrq between to_date(#{kssj},'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj},'yyyy-MM-dd')

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq wjrq from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.sfsc = 'N' and t.slrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.wcrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq, t.bjrq, t.dqrq from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.ajlb_bm in ('1304', '1305') and t.sfsc = 'N' and t.slrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.wcrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq, t.bjrq, t.dqrq

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq wjrq, t.dqjd from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.dqjd = '流程结束' and t.sfsc = 'N' and t.wcrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq, t.dqjd

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq wjrq, t.dqjd from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbbm_bm = #{bmbm} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.dqjd = '流程结束' and t.sfsc = 'N' and t.wcrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq, t.dqjd

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq wjrq from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.sfsc = 'N' and t.slrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq

select * from ( select a.bmsah, a.tysah, a.ajmc, a.ajlb_mc, a.ajlb_bm, a.cbr, a.cbrgh, a.cbbm_mc, a.cbbm_bm, a.slrq, (select max(ws.sprq) sprq from yx_ws_sl_tyyw ws where ws.bmsah = a.bmsah and ws.tysah = a.tysah and ws.sfsc = 'N' ) as wjrq from ( select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t inner join yx_ws_sl_tyyw w on t.bmsah = w.bmsah and t.tysah = w.tysah where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.sfsc = 'N' and w.sfsc = 'N' group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq ) a ) where wjrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw t inner join yx_ws_sl_tyyw w on t.bmsah = w.bmsah and t.tysah = w.tysah where t.cbdw_bm = #{dwbm} and t.cbrgh = #{gh} and t.ajzt in ('2', '3') and t.sfsc = 'N' and w.sfsc = 'N' and w.wsmbbh in ('100000020337', '100000020338', '100000020306') and t.slrq between to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') group by t.bmsah, t.tysah, t.ajmc, t.ajlb_mc, t.ajlb_bm, t.cbr, t.cbrgh, t.cbbm_mc, t.cbbm_bm, t.slrq, t.wcrq

SELECT GG.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW GG INNER JOIN TYYW_ZJ_LAJD_TYYW JD ON GG.BMSAH = JD.BMSAH AND JD.SFSC = 'N' INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON GG.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC = 'N' WHERE GG.SFSC = 'N' AND GG.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND GG.CBRGH = #{gh} AND GG.AJLB_BM = '0204' AND JD.XZZFJGYSRQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.XZZFJGYSRQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.JDLX_DM = '0225123040300'
UNION ALL
SELECT GG.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW GG INNER JOIN TYYW_WJ_LAJD_TYYW JD ON GG.BMSAH = JD.BMSAH AND JD.SFSC = 'N' INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON GG.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC = 'N' WHERE GG.SFSC = 'N' AND GG.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND GG.CBRGH = #{gh} AND GG.AJLB_BM='1704' AND JD.XZZFJGYSRQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.XZZFJGYSRQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.JDLX_DM = '0225123040300'

SELECT GG.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW GG INNER JOIN TYYW_ZJ_LAJD_TYYW JD ON GG.BMSAH = JD.BMSAH AND JD.SFSC = 'N' INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON GG.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC = 'N' WHERE GG.SFSC = 'N' AND GG.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND GG.CBRGH = #{gh} AND GG.AJLB_BM = '0204' AND JD.LARQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.LARQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.JDLX_DM = '0225123040300' AND JD.LAJG_DM BETWEEN '9901190102000' AND '9901190102999'
UNION ALL

SELECT GG.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW GG INNER JOIN TYYW_ZJ_LAJD_TYYW JD ON GG.BMSAH = JD.BMSAH AND JD.SFSC = 'N' INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON GG.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC = 'N' WHERE GG.SFSC = 'N' AND GG.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND GG.CBRGH = #{gh} AND GG.AJLB_BM = '0204' AND ( (JD.GAJGZDLARQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.GAJGZDLARQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) OR (JD.GAZXTZLARQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JD.GAZXTZLARQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ) AND JD.JDLX_DM = '0225123040100'

SELECT JBXX.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW JBXX INNER JOIN XT_DM_GXDWBM_TYYW DWBM ON JBXX.CBDW_BM = DWBM.DWBM AND JBXX.ZCJG_DWDM = DWBM.GXDWDM INNER JOIN TYYW_GS_SCQS_TYYW SCQS ON JBXX.BMSAH = SCQS.BMSAH INNER JOIN TYYW_GS_XYRQK_TYYW XYRQK ON JBXX.BMSAH = XYRQK.BMSAH INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON JBXX.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC='N' WHERE JBXX.SFSC = 'N' AND JBXX.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND JBXX.CBRGH = #{gh} AND JBXX.AJLB_BM = '0301' AND SCQS.YSPJSXRQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND SCQS.YSPJSXRQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND XYRQK.SFLAJDDX = 'Y' AND ( (XYRQK.YSPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903101000000' AND '9903107999000' OR XYRQK.YSPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903110000000' AND '9903110999900' ) AND DWBM.GXDWLB_DM BETWEEN '9901190102000' AND '9901190105000' )

SELECT JBXX.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW JBXX INNER JOIN XT_DM_GXDWBM_TYYW DWBM ON JBXX.CBDW_BM=DWBM.DWBM AND JBXX.ZCJG_DWDM=DWBM.GXDWDM INNER JOIN TYYW_GS_XYRQK_TYYW XYRQK ON JBXX.BMSAH=XYRQK.BMSAH INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON JBXX.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC='N' WHERE JBXX.SFSC='N' AND JBXX.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND JBXX.CBRGH = #{gh} AND JBXX.AJLB_BM='0301' AND XYRQK.ESCPWSSDRQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND XYRQK.ESCPWSSDRQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND (XYRQK.ESCPJG_DM <> '0307191502000' AND XYRQK.ESCPJG_DM <> '0307191505000') AND XYRQK.SFLAJDDX = 'Y' AND ( (XYRQK.ESPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903101000000' AND '9903107999000' OR XYRQK.ESPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903110000000' AND '9903110999900' ) AND DWBM.GXDWLB_DM BETWEEN '9901190102000' AND '9901190105000' )

SELECT JBXX.* FROM TYYW_GG_AJJBXX_TYYW JBXX INNER JOIN XT_DM_GXDWBM_TYYW DWBM ON JBXX.CBDW_BM=DWBM.DWBM AND JBXX.ZCJG_DWDM=DWBM.GXDWDM INNER JOIN TYYW_GS_ESSS_TYYW ESSS ON JBXX.BMSAH=ESSS.BMSAH INNER JOIN TYYW_GS_XYRQK_TYYW XYRQK ON JBXX.BMSAH=XYRQK.BMSAH INNER JOIN TYYW_GG_XYRJBXX_TYYW XYR ON JBXX.BMSAH = XYR.BMSAH AND XYR.SFSC='N' WHERE JBXX.SFSC='N' AND JBXX.CBDW_BM = #{dwbm} AND JBXX.CBRGH = #{gh} AND JBXX.AJLB_BM = '0303' AND (XYRQK.ESCPJG_DM <> '0307191502000' AND XYRQK.ESCPJG_DM <> '0307191505000' ) AND XYRQK.ESCPWSSDRQ >= to_date(#{kssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND XYRQK.ESCPWSSDRQ <= to_date(#{jssj}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND XYRQK.SFLAJDDX = 'Y' AND ( (XYRQK.ESPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903101000000' AND '9903107999000' OR XYRQK.ESPJZM_AYDM BETWEEN '9903110000000' AND '9903110999900' ) AND DWBM.GXDWLB_DM BETWEEN '9901190102000' AND '9901190105000' ) AND ESSS.CTRQ IS NOT NULL

select a.bmsah, a.tysah, a.ajmc, a.ajlb_mc, a.ajlb_bm, a.cbr, a.cbrgh, a.cbbm_mc, a.cbbm_bm, a.slrq, (case when (select max(ws.sprq) sprq from yx_ws_sl_tyyw ws where ws.bmsah = a.bmsah and ws.tysah = a.tysah and ws.sfsc = 'N' and ws.wsmbbh in ('100000090009', '100000090018', '100000090020', '100000090021', '100000090031', '100000090032', '100000090053', '100000090062', '100000090064', '100000090077', '100000090080', '100000090082', '100000090083', '100000090088', '100000090092', '100000090096','100000090110' ) ) is not null or (select max(ws.sprq) sprq from yx_ws_sl_tyyw ws where ws.bmsah = a.bmsah and ws.tysah = a.tysah and ws.sfsc = 'N' and ws.wsmbbh in ('100000090009', '100000090018', '100000090020', '100000090021', '100000090031', '100000090032', '100000090053', '100000090062', '100000090064', '100000090077', '100000090080', '100000090082', '100000090083', '100000090088', '100000090092', '100000090096','100000090110' ) ) != '' then (select max(ws.sprq) sprq from yx_ws_sl_tyyw ws where ws.bmsah = a.bmsah and ws.tysah = a.tysah and ws.sfsc = 'N' and ws.wsmbbh in ('100000090009', '100000090018', '100000090020', '100000090021', '100000090031', '100000090032', '100000090053', '100000090062', '100000090064', '100000090077', '100000090080', '100000090082', '100000090083', '100000090088', '100000090092', '100000090096','100000090110' ) ) when (select aj.ajlb_bm from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw aj where aj.bmsah = a.bmsah and aj.tysah = a.tysah ) = '0201' or (select aj.ajlb_bm from tyyw_gg_ajjbxx_tyyw aj where aj.bmsah = a.bmsah and aj.tysah = a.tysah ) = '0301'
